summary: The package initializes a Flask web application, configuring core services such as logging, database connections, migrations, authentication, email, and push notifications, and registers a set of modular blueprints. It also provides utilities to define and collect Flask blueprints with configurable names and URL prefixes for streamlined registration.
business_intent: To provide a ready-to-run, extensible web platform that supports user authentication, communication, and pointâ€‘based incentive management through a structured Flask architecture.
